issue.title: [Java] BoundsChecking.java defaulting behavior for old drill parameter seems off
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4851](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4851). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In order to turn bounds checking off you still need to flip the old deprecated parameter.  We should probably change it to true by default, so only the new arrow parameter is used.
